title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for the purposes of giving
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 11) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 23 December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited road traffic (licensing drivers) (amendment) (no 11) regulation 2020 (2) regulation come operation 23 december 2020

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for the purposes of giving
heading: 2. Schedule 1 to the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 2006
text_raw:
2. Schedule 1 to the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 2006 

(S.I. No. 537 of 2006) is amended - 

(a) by the substitution of form D.202 set out in Part 1 of the Schedule 

for form D.202 in Schedule 1, and 

(b) by the substitution of form D.402 set out in Part 2 of the Schedule 

for form D.402 in Schedule 1. 

1 OJ No. L 403, 30.12.2006, p. 18. 
2 OJ No. L 314, 29.11.2011, p. 31. 
3 OJ No. L 158, 10.6.2013, p. 356. 
4 OJ No. L 107, 25.4.2015, p. 68. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [684] 3

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for the purposes of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 
2006 (S.I. 537 of 2006) by replacing Form D.202 (learner permit) and Form 
D.402 (driving licence) in Schedule 1 with an updated version of the forms in 
order to identify Item 4d as the driver number. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [684] 7
